Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\base\Extension

All Classes | Methods
Inheritanceyii\base\Extension
Available since version2.0
Source Code
Extension is the base class that may be extended by individual extensions.

Extension serves as the bootstrap class for extensions. When an extension is installed via composer, the init() method of its Extension class (if any) will be invoked during the application initialization stage.

Public Methods

Hide inherited methods

MethodDescriptionDefined By
init() Initializes the extension. yii\base\Extension

Method Details

init() method
void init( )

Initializes the extension.

This method is invoked at the end of yii\base\Application::init().
